author: rbowen
msg: Mention third-party distributions, and provide a link to the wiki page
listing common layouts of these 3p distros.

author: olegk
msg: Move default implementations of the majority of abstract classes from DefaultHttpClient to AbstractHttpClient

author: mukulg
msg: Fixes to assertions evaluations on elements with simpleType's specifying default values.
It seems that the following element declaration,
should successfully validate the following instance fragment,
(I believe that XML schema assertions should have access to the default value of the element, in case the instance document doesn't provide a value for such an element)
Prior to this fix, a text node that needs to be constructed from the default value specified in the schema (with value "hi" in this case) wasn't part of the XDM tree on which assertions evaluated.
